title: Cliff Notes: Secrets To Build Your Real Estate Portfolio In 2022
itunes:title: Cliff Notes: Secrets To Build Your Real Estate Portfolio In 2022
description:
On this Cliff Notes, Matthew Garland better known as MG the Mortgage Guy and Jullien Gordon aka Mr. Multi family covered the following:


DOWN PAYMENTS: How to avoid 25% down payments so that you can scale your portfolio beyond 1 property


DEAL FLOW: How to find cash-flowing off-market deals near you or in less expensive smaller markets


DEAL ANALYSIS: How to analyze and structure different types of deals so you can keep growing #realestate #homebuying #investing 


Link to 4-3-2-1 Black Friday Sale: Http://www.get4321.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
